name: RTF Management
overview: RTF Management is a principal investment firm. It invests through its fund Russian Technology Fund. The company is structured as a limited partnership formed under the laws of the State of Delaware in the U.S. It focuses on equity and debt investments in Russian technology-related ventures. Investment Deal Flow is principally generated by a three person office on the premises of St.-Petersburg Regional Foundation for Scientific and Technological Development. The fund invests in small Russian companies which are focused primarily on the commercial exploitation of technology products in the domestic markets, although the transfer of technology externally may also be financed. It intends to be a minority shareholder. An investment bias is towards existing companies rather than ‘start-ups’. The anticipated average duration of the fund’s holdings is 5 to 6 years. RTF Management was founded in 1995 and is based in St. Petersburg, Russian Federation.
